11.name: Skillful
11.description: Your range of skills is quite impressive.
11.requirement: Earn  hero points by completing hero challenges or by gaining a level with a level 80 character.

91.name: Tailor
91.requirement: Reach rating  in the tailor discipline.

96.name: Norn Specialty Armors
96.requirement: Soulbind  unique piece of norn cultural armor.

100.name: Shiverpeak Explorer
100.description: You've explored the frozen stomping grounds of the legendary norn.
100.requirement: Explore all areas in the Shiverpeaks.

bits.text: Frostgorge Sound: The Sea of Lamentation
Snowden Drifts: Song of Final Exile
Timberline Falls: Tail of the Serpent
Timberline Falls: Lair of the Coil

148.name: King Jalis's Refuge
148.description: Learn the secret of King Jalis's refuge.

166.name: Keg Interceptions
166.description: Grab those kegs. Block those points.

461.name: The Gathering Storm
461.description: Invaders are attacking in Wayfarer Foothills and Diessa Plateau. Take them down before they can displace any more refugees!

614.name: The Goggles Do Nothing
614.description: Put on the diving goggles and dive into a Southsun lava pool.

650.name: Zhaitasty
650.requirement: You've sampled—indulged in, really—the official candy of Dragon Bash.

781.name: Hot-Air Balloonist
781.requirement: Travel by hot-air balloon to Divinity's Reach.

794.name: Queen's Gauntlet Challenger
794.requirement: Defeat a boss in the Queen's Gauntlet.

801.name: Blobs, Schmobs
801.requirement: Defeat Subject 7 without killing any oozes.

945.name: Daily WvW Big Spender
945.requirement: Spend  Badge of Honor in World versus World.

946.name: Daily WvW Master of Monuments
946.requirement: Capture  ruin or shrine in any of the WvW Borderlands.

966.name: Key Maker
966.requirement: Create an Aether Key using Aether Key Pieces.

987.name: Obsidian Leaper in the Mists
987.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle in Obsidian Sanctum.

1035.name: Jumping Mad II
1035.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles.

1049.name: Halloween Costume-Brawl Champion III
1049.description: Emerge as a champion from a costume brawl.

1079.name: Toxic Gardener
1079.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1119.name: Tower Toxic Alliance Slayer
1119.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1140.name: Tower of Nightmares Diver
1140.requirement: Use the diving goggles and jump from the top of the Tower of Nightmares.

1214.name: Aftermath Shock Wave Jumper
1214.requirement: Avoid the toxic wurm queen's shock waves by jumping over them.

1237.name: Aftermath Viathan Restorer III
1237.requirement: Complete  event in and around Viathan Lake in Kessex Hills.

1328.name: Boss Thumper XII
1328.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1542.name: Well Aren't You Special
1542.requirement: Capture  enemy special objective in Edge of the Mists.

1550.name: Mists Invasion Defender
1550.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in the Mists.

1574.name: Boss Blitz: Beat Boom-Boom
1574.requirement: Defeat Boom-Boom Baines during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

1663.name: Butterflies and Viscera
1663.description: Story Instance: Trouble at Fort Salma
1663.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem thrasher without losing any of Marjory's minions.

1705.name: Super Sleuth
1705.requirement: Complete the party investigation using only the twelve necessary conversation steps.

1797.name: Iron
1797.requirement: Defeat Champion Mordrem Troll Iron. Active during The Breach after Pact Assault Preparations has been fully completed.

1863.name: Daily Elementalist Winner
1863.requirement: Win  PvP match as an elementalist.

1875.name: Daily Tears of Itlaocol Minidungeon
1875.requirement: Complete the Tears of Itlaocol minidungeon in Caledon Forest.

1885.name: Daily Craze's Folly Jumping Puzzle
1885.requirement: Complete the Craze's Folly jumping puzzle in Blazeridge Steppes.

1926.name: Daily Demongrub Pits Jumping Puzzle
1926.requirement: Complete the Demongrub Pits jumping puzzle in Queensdale.

1974.name: Daily Orr Forager
1974.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1974.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following Orr maps: Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, and Cursed Shore.

2093.name: Daily Guardian or Engineer Winner
2093.requirement: Win  PvP match as a guardian or engineer.

2144.name: Verdant Brink Insight: The Corpse Grove
2144.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2266.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 35
2266.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2287.name: Is A Good Offense
2287.requirement: Choose to go with Tizlak to attack the Mordrem Guard at their staging area before they can attack the Itzel village.

2316.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 5
2316.requirement: Complete  scale 5 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2323.name: Ogre Airship Climber
2323.requirement: Climb to the top of the crashed airship in the Ogre camp.

2411.name: Daily Fractal Champion
2411.requirement: Complete  different scale 51–100 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2427.name: Powered Up
2427.requirement: Participate in powering up each of the outposts around Auric Basin.

2503.name: The Predator II: The Perfected Rifle
2503.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Hunter has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secret to weighting a barrel.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to balancing a stock.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2509.name: Heart of Thorns Act II Mastery
2509.requirement: Complete all  Heart of Thorns Act II achievements.

2516.name: Where Exalted Dare
2516.requirement: Go to the vinetooth den to find Herta.
2516.locked_text: Speak to Sage Laural at Westgate to receive an auric viewer, then scan the tablets in the city for clues to Herta's location.

2583.name: "Slice of Sky" Strongbox
2583.requirement: Search in the Lastgear Standing area for the strongbox from the "Slice of Sky."

2585.name: Mistward Warfists
2585.requirement: Collect all  items and skins to forge your Mistward Warfists.
2585.locked_text: Complete the Devastation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warfists collection.

bits.text: Defeat the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes.
Purchase for geodes in Dry Top.

2680.name: Essence Collector—Veteran
2680.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.
2680.requirement: Purchase 1 Essence of Challenge from the League Vendor.

2752.name: Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice
2752.requirement: Complete all 11 Path of Ascension II achievements.

2767.name: Honorary Krewe Member
2767.description: You must be this smart to enter.
2767.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's workshop in Divinity's Reach.

2795.name: Light Up the Sky
2795.requirement: Set off  Lunar New Year fireworks.

2873.name: Adventuring 103
2873.requirement: Complete World 1, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2900.name: Daily Tier 1 Aquatic Ruins
2900.requirement: Complete Aquatic Ruins at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2911.name: Daily Tier 1 Volcanic
2911.requirement: Complete Volcanic at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2974.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: A Nontraditional Family
2974.description: "Family isn't defined by blood or a shared name. They're who we go to when everything's against us, and we know they'll be there for us for no reason other than we're us."

bits.text: Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin.
Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin after obtaining the Tiger Den Map.
Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin after obtaining the Baby Book.
Complete the Tiger Training Guide subcollection.
Complete the Spirit of the Tiger achievement and unlock this mini in your wardrobe.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Scholar of Secrets ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

3053.name: Conspiracy of Dunces
3053.requirement: Find the journals chronicling the White Mantle's plans.

3065.name: Confessor's Stronghold
3065.requirement: Pursue and capture Lord Caudecus Beetlestone.

3108.name: Daily Ember Bay Karka or Jade Construct
3108.requirement: Slay the champion karka or the champion jade construct.

3110.name: The Friendly Ghost
3110.description: "It gets lonely here after the first hundred years...then you start thinking rocks are your friends. You are a sight for sore eyes. Thank you for keeping me company and reminding me of my humanity." —Captain Grumby
3110.requirement: Bring Captain Grumby a few pieces of his ship to remind him of his home.

3117.name: Standing Ovation
3117.description: The crowd will remember me this day.
3117.requirement: Win  rated match in the Eternal Coliseum.

3305.name: Daily Lake Doric: Like Clockwork
3305.requirement: Help the Seraph fight back the White Mantle in periodic skirmishes in the area.

3344.name: A Fly in the Ointment
3344.requirement: Interfere with the White Mantle in Fort Evennia 10 times without fleeing or getting caught.

3361.name: A Good Use
3361.requirement: Collect fish from Lake Doric near Saidra's Haven and put them to good use.

3481.name: Storyteller: Melandru
3481.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Melandru.

bits.text: Guarded by the Shrine of Melandru.
Behind the ruined rubble near Thoroughfare Ruins.
Be watchful at the Watchman's Roost.
Stuffed within the cracks of the Ancient Greenhouse.
Follow the winding path to its downfall.
Inside the ship that sits on both land and sea.

3503.name: Not on My Watch
3503.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"Your friends aren't coming."
3503.requirement: Kill the White Mantle guarding the second crystal shard without letting them call reinforcements.

3591.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Above the Flats
3591.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3598.name: Reaper of the Awakened
3598.description: They won't praise Joko after this!

3614.name: Junkyard Weaponsmith
3614.requirement: Combine objects to create makeshift weapons for the unarmed villagers of Zephyr's Trace, in Destiny's Gorge.

3626.name: Daily Crystal Oasis Bounty Hunter
3626.requirement: Complete a bounty in Crystal Oasis.

3659.name: Desolation Insight: Henge of Joko
3659.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3678.name: Highlands Bounty Tour
3678.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location.

3723.name: Elon Riverlands Griffon Master: Gold
3723.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3840.name: Elon Riverlands Griffon Master: Silver
3840.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3891.name: Junundu Master Certification
3891.requirement: Successfully complete the cadet training course using a junundu wurm in Kaluun Ravine, and hit all bonus targets in a single attempt.

3926.name: Clocktower's Champion
3926.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower jumping puzzle.

3940.name: Arguably Foodlike
3940.requirement: Eat more than the recommended intake of candy corn.

3966.name: Daily Domain of Istan Mordant Crescent Champion Slayer
3966.requirement: Kill two Mordant Crescent Champions in the Domain of Istan.

4030.name: Daily Tier 3 Twilight Oasis
4030.requirement: Complete Twilight Oasis at fractal scale 51 or higher.

4277.name: Slalom Skimmer
4277.description: There are few experiences better than soaring your skimmer over the crystal clear waters off the Labyrinthine Cliffs!
4277.requirement: Finish the Skimmer Slalom race in the Labyrinthine Cliffs within 2 minutes and 30 seconds (race event or adventure).

4301.name: Barnstorming the Cliffs
4301.requirement: Complete the Labyrinthine Cliffs Griffon Master adventure.

4342.name: A Shattered Nation
4342.requirement: Meet up with Braham at Vehtendi Vineyard.

4549.name: Chasing Tales: Storm's Eye
4549.description: Asaliea was known for an unbreakable resolve, no matter the circumstance.
4549.requirement: Defeat the temporal storm elemental in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated the temporal storm elemental in Thunderhead Peaks while wielding a focus.

4602.name: Daily Thunderhead Peaks Chest Hunter
4602.requirement: Open three dwarven chests within Thunderhead Peaks.

4616.name: Two the Barricades!
4616.requirement: Successfully defend all barricades from the Branded attack at Symphony's Haven.

4650.name: Master of Coins, World 2
4650.requirement: Get a Gold award in each time challenge Adventure in World 2.

4800.name: Mad with Power
4800.description: His power trip has gone too far!
4800.requirement: Defeat Qadim the Peerless while the challenge mote is active.

4863.name: (Annual) Formidable Flier
4863.requirement: Complete the Flying Dolyak race course  times in Labyrinthine Cliffs (race event or adventure). Finishing in the race event grants extra progress. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4869.name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Slaughter Sparcus
4869.requirement: Defeat Sparcus Firesplash during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4871.name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Kill Kuraii
4871.requirement: Defeat Kuraii the Cruel during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4884.name: Legendary Benefactor
4884.requirement: Donate upgrade materials to master crafters in Lion's Arch.

4910.name: Grothmar Grand Tour: Silver Challenge
4910.requirement: Finish the Grothmar Grand Tour within the silver challenge time limit.

5027.name: Essence Looter
5027.requirement: Open all the vigilance, valor, and resilience essence chests in East Bjora Marches.

5061.name: Constant Vigilance
5061.requirement: Defeat the boneskinner in the Aberrant Forest without losing any survivors.

5080.name: Draconic Weapon Collection
5080.requirement: Unlock all  Draconic weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5096.name: Bringing Light to the Darkness
5096.description: Where there was once only ice and death, let the light shine forth.
5096.requirement: Light the braziers throughout West Bjora Marches.

bits.text: A ruin once devoted to the greatest of hunts
A vista atop the highest peaks
A vista in a quiet grotto
A lost tower buried in the mountains
A hidden place, riddled with gates
A vista in a cavern filled with lost history
A peak that bore witness to Koda's loss

5112.name: Koda Be Praised
5112.requirement: Complete each unique Trial of Koda challenge.

bits.text: Plant Banners to Challenge the Svanir

5134.name: A Bountiful Pastime
5134.requirement: Defeat the champions wandering the West Bjora Marches.

5240.name: The Glitched Adventure
5240.requirement: Unlock all  Glitched Adventure weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5243.name: Good Kitty
5243.description: Fur almost as soft as Rytlock's. And that's a familiar purr...

5283.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast AA Soldier
5283.requirement: Complete a Destroy Dominion Bombers event in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5310.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Donor
5310.requirement: Donate materials to any United Legions quaestor in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5353.name: A Wrench in the Works
5353.description: Journal: A Wrench in the Works Completed
5353.requirement: Complete the story chapter A Wrench in the Works.

5510.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Gendarran Fields
5510.requirement: Complete the Gendarran Fields Dragon Response Mission.

5663.name: Top Dragon Responder: Fireheart Rise
5663.requirement: Complete  Fireheart Rise Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5694.name: Double (Elder) Dragon
5694.requirement: Defeat Primordus and Jormag  time in the Dragonstorm encounter.

5699.name: Fast Fire and Frost Fighter
5699.requirement: Destroy all ley siphons within 120 seconds during the Dragonstorm encounter.

5701.name: Cooler Than Cool
5701.requirement: During the Dragonstorm encounter, dodge the Breath of Jormag attack  time.

5737.name: Ore Miner: Bloodstone Fen
5737.requirement: Mine ore  times in Bloodstone Fen.

5784.name: Return to Caithe's Reconnaissance Squad
5784.requirement: Complete the mission Caithe's Reconnaissance Squad in Living World Season 2 Episode 5.

5794.name: Reconquering Abaddon's Ascent
5794.requirement: Reach the top of the tower.

5886.name: Return to the Eye of the North
5886.requirement: Complete  Return to Steel and Fire achievements.

6006.name: Treasure Hunter: Drizzlewood Coast
6006.requirement: Defeat a cache keeper in Drizzlewood Coast.

6045.name: Court Duty: Race to the Precipice
6045.requirement: Complete mount races in the Mad King's Labyrinth or Mad King's Raceway. Faster times and top-three finishes award extra progress.

6051.name: (Annual) Extra Life Donor
6051.requirement: Purchase an item from the Gem Store that contributes to Extra Life.

6054.name: League Participator—3v3 Season Five
6054.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Five.

6061.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty
6061.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty.

6064.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-One
6064.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-One.

6086.name: High Tier
6086.requirement: Equip a tier 3 jade bot module.

6093.name: Quietus
6093.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the harbinger's pistol, Quietus.
6093.locked_text: Begin training the necromancer's harbinger elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the necromancer's harbinger elite specialization.
Completely train the necromancer's harbinger elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Ancient Pistol Frame, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As a necromancer, complete the Echovald Wilds meta-event.
As a necromancer, complete the New Kaineng City meta-event.
As a necromancer, complete the Ministry of Security story instance or strike.
As a harbinger, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a blue dorado in New Kaineng City.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor at New Kaineng City.
Purchased from the map currency vendor in the Echovald Wilds.
Earned by defeating Purist enemies in Seitung Province.
Earn map completion in New Kaineng City as a necromancer.
As a necromancer, defeat a Jade Maw near Dragon's End.
Acquired by harvesting soybeans as a necromancer.

6173.name: It's a Mercy
6173.description: No one should have to die twice.
6173.requirement: Locate and eliminate all of Ankka's Risen monstrosities.

6204.name: Good to See You
6204.requirement: Explore every conversation topic with your friends from Dragon's Watch.

bits.text: Say hi to Kasmeer and Marjory.
Catch up with Kasmeer and Marjory.
See how Kasmeer and Marjory are feeling.

6252.name: To Catch a Spider
6252.description: Journal: To Catch a Spider Completed
6252.requirement: Set up a base of operations and reconnoiter.

6278.name: Unruffled
6278.requirement: Defeat the chapter boss without being downed.

6288.name: Take That, Bureaucrats!
6288.requirement: Get creative in your Ministry of Transportation paperwork.

6325.name: Vengeance Is Not Yours
6325.requirement: Defeat the malfunctioning Gods' Vengeance without being hit more than 50 times by its abilities.

6344.name: Maguuma Fisher
6344.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6344.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of the Maguuma Jungle.

6386.name: Ward Nemesis
6386.requirement: Successfully disabled 10 wards in a row during the House zu Heltzer archaeology event.

6442.name: Think Before You Leap
6442.requirement: Clear the Armada using the leap skill less than 10 times.

6455.name: Albax, the Unlucky
6455.description: "Bring to me your world, for I have lost mine." —Albax
6455.requirement: Bring Albax lucky items from throughout Tyria by solving his riddles.

bits.text: "Brave the dead land to claim the foot of the swiftest." Albax pointed north, toward the Cursed Shore of Orr.
"Find the former walker of the blasted land, and gain a symbol of new growth." Albax shrugged while talking of the Branded landscape of the Iron Marches.
"In homes in pale parchment hills, find the form of an old survivor in the hands of a young one." Albax smiled, thinking of the rivers of Timberline Falls.
"In lush lands wracked with waste, ask for that which glitters in their patron's gaze." Albax's eyes opened wide picturing the dangers of Mount Maelstrom.
"The noble bird has been swept from solitude into the hands of chaos." Albax hinted at the monks of Shing Jea.
"The porcelain feline beckons you toward service in the name of the savory." Albax mentioned the smell of food in New Kaineng City.
"Bathed in gold and hubris, luck itself will lead you to me." Albax described a special room of games in Arborstone.
"In the sea of green, among the scaly ones, a relic lies with the mistakes of one's past." Albax gestured at the Jade Sea all around him.
"A sacred weapon is held in the boughs of great trees, never to be turned against them." Albax spoke of the verdant sights of the Maguuma Jungle.
"The needy hold tight to a hope of plenty in a pitiless golden land." Albax cringed while thinking of the heat in the Crystal Desert.

6467.name: Possession
6467.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the specter's scepter, Possession.
6467.locked_text: Begin training the thief's specter elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the thief's specter elite specialization.
Completely train the thief's specter elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Ancient Scepter Core, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As a thief, complete the Seitung Province meta-event.
As a thief, complete the New Kaineng City meta-event.
As a thief, defeat Ankka in in the End of Dragons story or strike mission.
As a specter, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a sturgeon in New Kaineng City.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor in the Echovald Wilds.
Purchased from the map currency vendor in Seitung Province.
Earned by defeating Purist enemies in New Kaineng City.
As a thief, earn map completion in Seitung Province.
As a thief, defeat the Jade Maw in Dragon's End.
Acquired from petrified Echovald saplings as a thief.

6500.name: Weight of the World
6500.description: Journal: Weight of the World Completed

6517.name: Fool's Journey
6517.requirement: Speak with the Ancient Canine in Lion's Arch.

6572.name: Fractal Recursion: Captain Mai Trin
6572.requirement: Complete the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal after completing the "Sky Pirates" episode.

6588.name: Completing Events IV
6588.requirement:
Participate in  event in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6596.name: Using the Mystic Forge
6596.requirement:
Create  item in the Mystic Forge.

<c=@reminder>The Mystic Forge transforms items in a variety of ways, including raising the tier of crafting materials and upgrading equipment. The forge can be accessed from major cities throughout Tyria.</c>

6611.name: Completing Events II
6611.requirement:
Participate in  event.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6615.name: The Adventure Begins
6615.requirement: Enter Queensdale, the Plains of Ashford, Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, or Wayfarer Foothills for the first time.

6641.name: Using Food Consumables
6641.requirement:
Use  consumable food item to obtain nourishment bonuses.

<c=@reminder>Food consumables boost attributes when eaten. Hover your mouse over a consumable to see what it does.</c>

6721.name: Discovering Waypoints III
6721.requirement:
Discover 5 waypoints in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6750.name: The Tower of Nightmares
6750.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Tower of Nightmares.

6778.name: Fear Not This Knight
6778.requirement: During each ground combat phase, prevent any prototypes from completing an aerial support attack. Defeat the Triumvirate without any squad members dying to Spaghettification, Dysapoptosis, or Thundering Ultimatum.

6781.name: The Battle for Lion's Arch
6781.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Battle for Lion's Arch.

6857.name: Black Lion Requisition Mission Week 3
6857.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help!
6857.requirement: Turn in materials with the Black Lion Requisition Officers at any major city during the event window.

6940.name: Unsundered
6940.requirement: Each time the final boss uses World Cleaver, defeat all Aspects before he can complete the attack. Then, complete the encounter.

6985.name: Assist Mabon
6985.requirement: Assist Mabon in getting to the Hall of Confluence.

7017.name: Skywatch Archipelago Mastery
7017.description: You've proven your dedication as a true member of the Astral Ward.

7069.name: Legendary Weapon: The Flameseeker Prophecies
7069.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon The Flameseeker Prophecies.

7078.name: Thunderhead Peaks Incursions
7078.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Thunderhead Peaks.

7102.name: Tentacle Toppler
7102.requirement: Successfully participate in Tentacle Rift Closing events.

7123.name: Sparkfly Fen Rift Hunting
7123.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Sparkfly Fen.

7151.name: Secrets Unobscured
7151.description: "Heart of the Obscure, reveal what lies hidden."
7151.requirement: Peer beyond the veil to uncover hidden treasures in the Wizard's Tower.

7609.name: Daily PvP Rush Contender
7609.requirement: Complete any PvP match. This achievement resets each day.

7662.name: New Kaineng City Incursions
7662.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in New Kaineng City.

7701.name: Dead Air
7701.requirement: While mounted on your skyscale, destroy Kryptis turrets throughout Heitor's territory in Inner Nayos.

7780.name: Obstructor of Malice
7780.requirement: Prevent Abraxces the Scorned from unleashing the malignant coalescence.

7813.name: Artisan of Arms: Revenant's Scepter
7813.description: Revenants channel energy through their scepters to bolster allies.
7813.requirement: Defeat enemies with a scepter as a revenant.

7905.name: Tall for One
7905.requirement: Try out a Fool's Tall Tonic.

7993.name: Master of Masteries: Secrets of the Obscure
7993.description: The wayfinder leaves no secret obscured.
7993.requirement: Complete  Mastery achievements in Secrets of the Obscure.

8029.name: Maguuma Veteran
8029.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8036.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Inner Nayos: Silver
8036.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Skyscale Target Practice in Inner Nayos adventure.

8051.name: Brothers, Together
8051.requirement: Defeat Cerus and Deimos within 5 seconds of each other in the Lonely Tower fractal.

8073.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Amnytas: Gold
8073.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Skyscale Target Practice in Amnytas adventure.

8117.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Lornar's Pass
8117.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8117.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Lornar's Pass.

8154.name: Lowland Shore Explorer
8154.description: You've explored the diverse biomes of Lowland Shore.
8154.requirement: Explore all areas in Lowland Shore.

8156.name: What's That Sound?
8156.requirement: Stand on the collapsing bridge near the fishing village.

8212.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Geyser Flow
8212.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8274.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Festering Vantage
8274.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8346.name: Autumn's Vale Renown Mastery
8346.description: Diplomacy isn't always about paperwork or negotiations. Sometimes you gotta get your paws a little dirty.
8346.requirement: Gain favor with the lowlanders to grow your friendship with them.

8349.name: Electrical Interference
8349.requirement: Block the conduit from charging 5 times.

8373.name: Revenge of the Wrathbringer (Weekly)
8373.requirement: Defeat the Wrathbringer during the Thunderhead Keep meta-event.

8432.name: Road of Victory VIII
8432.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8444.name: Klobjarne Geirr: Journey of the Claw
8444.requirement: Honor the Claw of legend and his five closest allies who led their bearkin out of the dragonstorm to safety.
8444.locked_text: Complete Janthir Wilds Chapter 13: Balrior Peak

bits.text: Talk to Unending Tribute at Maul Boneyards in Lowland Shore to learn how you can help.
Bind Klobjarne Geirr to your account.

8489.name: (Repeatable) Mount Balrior: Calibration Courier
8489.requirement: Deliver  calibrated essence in Mount Balrior Convergences.

8589.name: Home Sweet Homestead: The Echovald Wilds
8589.description: No! This is my triumph. You're jealous that my homestead eclipses your own!
8589.requirement: Complete events in the Echovald Wilds. Group events will award more progress.

8623.name: Respectable Researcher
8623.description: Doing things as they should be done.
8623.requirement: Complete the Capture Mistburned Creatures for Allies to Research event.

8662.name: Rolling Competitor: Ghostfire Run (Weekly)
8662.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Diessa Plateau. The final lap of a race event rewards extra progress. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8742.name: Bava Nisos Rift Hunting
8742.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Bava Nisos.

8749.name: Home Sweet Homestead: A Concert for the Ages
8749.description: You rocked out hard, now celebrate hard!
8749.requirement: Complete the A Concert for the Ages meta-event in Grothmar Valley.

8764.name: Immunocompromiser
8764.requirement: Take out one of the Bava Nisos titan's vital organs.

8772.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Decima: Silver
8772.requirement: Earn silver-rank timing or better in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8785.name: For Old Times' Sake
8785.description: A reminder to be a beacon of light in these times of darkness.
8785.requirement: Light a starlight lantern in Bava Nisos, for old time's sake.

8797.name: Adventurous Spirit: Skyscale Target Practice
8797.requirement: Complete any Skyscale Target Practice adventure in Horn of Maguuma.
